error.no_mining_device: Have no mining device. Must select at least one mining device (GPU or CPU)
error.no_mining_crypto_for_device: You must select at least one crypto algorithm in order to mine.
error.no_profitable_algorithms: All mining algorithms are not profitable. You can continue mine by enabling "Mine even projected profit lost" options in Settings

home.you_are_anonymous_mining: Jste v anonymním režimu. Pro platbu se přihlašte
home.miner_not_effective: Aktuální miner není efektivní. Pokouším se přepnout na jiný miner

hardware_detail.current_evaluate_title: Čekejte prosím, může to trvat několik minut

setting.auto_start_description: Automaticky začít těžit při nečinnosti systému a přestat, když se počítač používá
setting.auto_launch_description: Spustit Crypto Miner při spuštění počítače
setting.miner_off_notification_description: Zaslat e-mail v případě nečekaného zastavení těžby
setting.signin_required: Pro použití této funkce se přihlašte
setting.cpu_mining_description: Automatically start CPU mining when start mining
setting.gpu_mining_description: Automatically start GPU mining when start mining
setting.mining_options_changed: Please restart mining (click Stop, Start) to apply the changes
setting.mine_even_projected_profit_lost: Mine coin even when estimated earning is projected a profit lost?
setting.mine_even_projected_profit_lost_descript: Yes to mine all coins in your preferred list, No to mine filtered profitable cryptoes only

exclude_applications.title: Applications exclusion
exclude_applications.description: Select application(s) that you want to skip idle mining while it's running
exclude_applications.reload_hint: If the application does not has in below list, Try to start it & click refresh icon
exclude_applications.select_application_button: Do not mining if my applications are running
exclude_applications.add_hint: Add an application by select it from file dialog

setting.title: Settings

auto_update.new_version_downloading: Verze {{version}} byla nalezena a stahuje se
auto_update.new_version_downloaded: Nová verze byla stažena. Chcete aplikaci nyní restatrovat?

main.error_have_no_mining_device: Kompatibilní zařízení pro těžbu nebylo nalezeno
main.error_cannot_connect_pool: Nelze se připojit k poolu ({{poolinfo}}). Prosíme, zkontrolujte vaše připojení a ujistěte se, že port {{port}} není ve firewallu blokován.
main.miner_stopped_cannot_connect_stats_port: Port '{{port}}' je používán. Ujistěte se, že žádná další aplikace zrovna nepoužívá port {{port}}.
main.cpu_miner_not_found: CPU miner is not found. Maybe miner is deleted or CPU cryptoes are unselected in 'Preferred Algorithms' . Please check on 'Configure-Preferred Algorithms' menu. CPU cryptoes list [{{cpuCryptoes}}]
main.not_support_system: Device is not supported or out of memory. Please check on 'Configure-Preferred Algorithms' menu. Minable algorithms: [{{algorithms}}]
main.validate_fail_out_of_memory: Insufficient Video device memory. VRAM must be at least {{vram}} MB.
main.predict_dag_expire_date: DAG size of {{crypto}} is {{dagSize}} MB. Your Video RAM ({{curRAM}} MB) can mine to {{expireAt}}

miner_downloader.title: Stahování těžebního nástroje
miner_downloader.error_get_info: Při získávání těžebních informací se vyskytla chyba
miner_downloader.error_hash_verify_failed: Při stahování těžebního nástroje se vyskytla chyba, zkuste to znovu
miner_downloader.error_unzip: Při rozbalování souboru zip se vystytla chyba, zkuste to znovu
miner_downloader.error_interruption: The download is interrupted, please check your network and try again
miner_downloader.missing_mining_tool: For the mining with the highest profit, please try to update the mining tool(s) as soon as possible.

miner_exclusion.description: Following is a guideline to help you add virus folder exclusion for Freedom! Crypto miner. As the mining tools we will be downloading may be incorrectly classified as virus by windows defender.
miner_exclusion.add_to_exclusion_button: Auto add miners folder to Exclude list
miner_exclusion.add_miners_folder_to_exclusion_list_succ: Miners folder added to exclusion list successfully
miner_exclusion.add_miners_folder_to_exclusion_list_erro: Failed while adding miners folder to exclusion list, please try again or do it manually
miner_exclusion.auto_add_miners_folder_to_exclusion_list: Error while adding miners folder to Windows Defender's exclussion list, Please click button below to try again or try to restart Crypto Miner
miner_exclusion.exclusion_confirm_button: I have added miners folder to my Antivirus software's exclusion list.
miner_exclusion.heading: Exclude from Windows Defender
miner_exclusion.description_2: Add Crypto! Miner to Windows Defender's exclusions to allow the app to download the mining tools.
miner_exclusion.description_3: Add Crypto! Miner's folders to your antivirus exclusions

estimation.setup_wattage: Kliknutím nastavte příkon pro přesnější odhad
estimation.mining_electricity_consumption: Spotřeba el. energie vašich GPU/CPU při těžbě
estimation.use_detected_wattage: Použít data o příkonu získaná minerem

pay_me_now.payment_verification_explain: To verify if your account can receive payments from Freedom!, we will pay this account an amount of $0.01
pay_me_now.payment_not_found: User payment not found! Please update payment method at Freedom! dashboard.

instruction.instruction_tooltip: Some tips to improve mining performance or fix mining issues

affiliate_info.affiliate_description: Share your referral link to your friend and earn commission, see more detail {{here}}.
